channel.title: Problems with user-->tor(gateway)-->vpn connection
channel.description:
hey guys... I tried a lot! set up 2 virtual machines: 1. whonix gateway updated and working 2. win7 using the 1. machine as gateway.
then I set the network adapter to these settings: IP address 10.152.152.50 Subnet netmask 255.255.192.0 Default gateway 10.152.152.10 Preferred DNS server 10.152.152.10
everything worked fine. the whole traffic from the second win7 machine is working over the tor network!
then I installed openvpn and put in the certificates and configs from my vpn provider. when I try to connect it stucks while connecting....
with normal NAT and automatic IP everything works fine with the vpn. but when I put the internal network to Whonix with the network adapter settings above the vpn fails to connect.
would be realy nice to get a setup like this: me --> tor --> vpn --> www
did I forget anything? thx for reading and goodbye

item.title: Problems with user-->tor(gateway)-->vpn connection
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, OpenVPN config. Search https://www.whonix.org/wiki/TestVPN for:
tcp

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with user-->tor(gateway)-->vpn connection
item.dc:creator: creamon
item.description:
thanks for the fast reply!
how is it possible to change this?
as far as I know its the port? maybe in the openvpn conf something?

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with user-->tor(gateway)-->vpn connection
item.dc:creator: creamon
item.description:
hey guys…
I tried a lot!
set up 2 virtual machines:

  1. whonix gateway updated and working
  2. win7 using the 1. machine as gateway.

then I set the network adapter to these settings:
IP address 10.152.152.50
Subnet netmask 255.255.192.0
Default gateway 10.152.152.10
Preferred DNS server 10.152.152.10

everything worked fine. the whole traffic from the second win7 machine is working over the tor network!

then I installed openvpn and put in the certificates and configs from my vpn provider.
when I try to connect it stucks while connecting…

with normal NAT and automatic IP everything works fine with the vpn.
but when I put the internal network to Whonix with the network adapter settings above the vpn fails to connect.

would be realy nice to get a setup like this:
me --> tor --> vpn --> www

did I forget anything?
thx for reading and goodbye

Read full topic
